trends: There have been 17 other sightings in Flushing
There were no other sightings in Flushing on or around December 22nd 2012
Summary: At first glance,they appeared as flaming "lantern"-type objects..... until they stopped, hovered, and changed colors!
divs: sighting detailswhile driving west on the main street of the town, noticed 2 odd-looking, very bright, "flaming" type objects. i assumed they were probably "chinese lanterns" that many people "send up". i watched them for about 3 minutes, and both of the objects stopped, and were hovering- and the colors changed from a flaming red, to orange, and then a bright white, then to green! right then i knew that 1) chinese lanterns do not "hover", nor 2) do they randomly flash solid white, then green. both objects then began a slow course (much slower than an airplane\helicopter), and while driving home, noticed that they had "changed course" from sw to due north. when i returned home, (a 5 minute drive) and got out of the car- they were no longer visible! i have seen "chinese lanterns", planes, helicopters, etc.....and these 2 objects could have easily been mistaken for those lanterns- if you were not "paying attention" to the randomly, bright flashing colors! these objects also had no sequentially-flashing lights as an airplane would, and as far as i know- chinese lanterns do not change from flame red, to orange-red, to bright white, to green!
